import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; import { useRef } from "react"; export default function ContactMe() { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( 'service_cyaaj2u', // Replace with your actual Service ID 'template_c8vci5h', // Replace with your Template ID form.current, '5Ny9mPi54Y50WBKBY' // Replace with your Public Key ) .then( (result) => { alert("Message sent successfully!"); form.current.reset(); }, (error) => { alert("Failed to send message. Please try again."); } ); }; return (
